Articles.Content: 3024: you open the door, and are immediately flattened by a rush of earbuds and headphones. As you dig your way out, you notice an old connector used on all of them, but can’t remember what it was called. You guess it must have been rather common by the sheer variety of them.

3025: You find a shortcut to floor 3027.

3026: You would've found an elevator to the top here, but you skipped this floor.

3027: You're too tired to notice Jeb on his miraculously still-burning SRB.

Maybe he has Infinite Propellant hack on.

3028: A nice apartment. You sleep.

3029: How are you not noticing Jeb here?
3030: Jeb crashed into this floor. He waves at you from nearby while the SRB is still burning.
3031: You see the odd shop saying "SRBs for sale". Jeb walks in and gets a bunch for cheap.

3032:

Broomy broom.

On 5/12/2018 at 8:49 AM, TheKSPBeginner said:

3032:

Broomy broom.

3033. I'm in mum's car! Broomy broom.
Floor 3034 : A race.
Floor 3035: the hall of fame for the previous floors race, and a glass floor for spectators of the annual 6hr365day race. You watch for a while before moving on.

Floor 3036: You give up on ever reaching the top, and die.

Floor 3037: 15 years later, your son finds your remains and starts climbing.

Floor 3038: You find a massive robot on a throne, jeering at you, you climb up a ladder.

Floor 3039: By looking out the window, you realize that you are in space, you wonder how everyone can breath in here.

Floor 3040: You lose your sanity, only to find it on the next floor.

Floor 3041: you recall all 30 years you have spent climbing this building.
Floor 3042. Somebody kicks. You fly.
3043: You are swarmed by a swarm of birds.

3044:  You find a door, engraved on it is a wild rose entangled around a revolver, yet you choose not to open it.

(Handful of Kerbucks to anyone who appreciates this one)

Edited May 22, 2018 by Gargamel

On 5/19/2018 at 12:20 AM, Fraston said:

Floor 3039: By looking out the window, you realize that you are in space, you wonder how everyone can breath in here.﻿﻿

 

On 5/21/2018 at 2:21 AM, HansonKerman said:

3043: You are swarmed by a swarm of birds.

3045: You realise that birds can't fly in space because there's no air.
Floor 3046  -You see a duplicate of your self wake up from cryosleep and go to floor 3276
3047: You see a room with lots of computers showing persistent.sfs files for forum threads. You decide not to touch them.
Floor 3048 : BadS

3049: You see your utter disappointment, laying out on a table, vivisected.   The utter disappointment that nobody got your earlier reference that the game should have restarted/ended. 

You fight back a tear, shrug, and continue on.
Floor 3050: you lose your conscience, when you wake up, you are on the next floor.
Floor 3051: The server room for the KSP Forums. There is a partition for each subforum. The 'What did you do in KSP today' thread takes up 75% of KSP Discussion.

durrr

Edited May 31, 2018 by Fraston

Okay here goes...

Floor 3052: You find a table, on it is a map of this floor.

Floor 3053: you find an elevator to the top, but it’s out of service.

Floor 3054: You see a cross country skiing race.

Floor 3055:You find the winners podium for the last floors race.

Floor 3056: You find a poorly lit room with computers everywhere, and robots using them.

Floor 3057: this floor is strangely constructed out of 1s and 0s.

Floor 3058: You find an exercise room, and work out.

Floor 3059: there is a fountain that spits juice on this floor.

Floor 3060: You find a metal cylinder on a table and push a button on it,  a blade of light comes out.

Floor 3061: You find an operating room, its mostly empty.

Floor 3062:You find a shack made out of SRBs and wonder how safe that really is....
Floor 3063: Fraston resting his hand after typing ten floors.
